imagingbook.lib.image

Class ImageMath

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.lib.image.ImageMath

  • public abstract class ImageMath
extends Object
    This class provides some static utility methods for ImageJ's ImageProcessors. 2013-08-23: static methods converted to use generics.
